sentences.sentence: He could not get a single witness to establish independent corroboration of his version of the accident.
sentences.translation: 他找不到一个目击证人可以为他对事故的陈述提供独立的佐证。

sentences.sentence: The corroboration appears online in the journal Physical Review Letters.
sentences.translation: 此研究结果发表在《物理评论快报》网络版上。

sentences.sentence: The witness was unable to provide corroboration f what he had told the police.
sentences.translation: 证人无法证实他对警方的陈述.
